text: For patients where exenteraton was the final therapeutic option, the 5-year OS rate varied from 24.7 to $6 4 \%$ (seven studies1518,1522-1524,1527- 1529).It should be noted that these results have to be interpreted with caution notably because there is a large heterogeneity among included studies with respect to the type of procedure that was performed and the type of cancer that is being investigated (cervical, endometrial, vulvar or ovarian).
